mapper.sql: id as id , sort as sort , batchId as batchId , batch as batch , universityCode as universityCode , universityName as universityName , provinceId as provinceId , provinceName as provinceName , cityId as cityId , cityName as cityName , countyId as countyId , countyName as countyName , subject as subject , majoredId as majoredId , majoredName as majoredName , majoredCode as majoredCode , enrollNumber as enrollNumber , schoolLength as schoolLength , foreignLanguage as foreignLanguage , feeStandard as feeStandard , enrollInfo as enrollInfo , creatDate as creatDate , year as year
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_enroll_plan ( sort, batchId, batch, universityCode, universityName, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, subject, majoredId, majoredName, majoredCode, enrollNumber, schoolLength, foreignLanguage, feeStandard, enrollInfo, creatDate, year ) VALUES ( #{sort}, #{batchId}, #{batch}, #{universityCode}, #{universityName}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{countyId}, #{countyName}, #{subject}, #{majoredId}, #{majoredName}, #{majoredCode}, #{enrollNumber}, #{schoolLength}, #{foreignLanguage}, #{feeStandard}, #{enrollInfo}, #{creatDate}, #{year} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_enroll_plan
sort = #{sort},
batchId = #{batchId},
batch = #{batch},
universityCode = #{universityCode},
universityName = #{universityName},
provinceId = #{provinceId},
provinceName = #{provinceName},
cityId = #{cityId},
cityName = #{cityName},
countyId = #{countyId},
countyName = #{countyName},
subject = #{subject},
majoredId = #{majoredId},
majoredName = #{majoredName},
majoredCode = #{majoredCode},
enrollNumber = #{enrollNumber},
schoolLength = #{schoolLength},
foreignLanguage = #{foreignLanguage},
feeStandard = #{feeStandard},
enrollInfo = #{enrollInfo},
creatDate = #{creatDate},
year = #{year},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_enroll_plan
sort = #{map.sort},
batchId = #{map.batchId},
batch = #{map.batch},
universityCode = #{map.universityCode},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
provinceId = #{map.provinceId},
provinceName = #{map.provinceName},
cityId = #{map.cityId},
cityName = #{map.cityName},
countyId = #{map.countyId},
countyName = #{map.countyName},
subject = #{map.subject},
majoredId = #{map.majoredId},
majoredName = #{map.majoredName},
majoredCode = #{map.majoredCode},
enrollNumber = #{map.enrollNumber},
schoolLength = #{map.schoolLength},
foreignLanguage = #{map.foreignLanguage},
feeStandard = #{map.feeStandard},
enrollInfo = #{map.enrollInfo},
creatDate = #{map.creatDate},
year = #{map.year},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_enroll_plan ( sort, batchId, batch, universityCode, universityName, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, subject, majoredId, majoredName, majoredCode, enrollNumber, schoolLength, foreignLanguage, feeStandard, enrollInfo, creatDate, year ) VALUES ( #{map.sort}, #{map.batchId}, #{map.batch}, #{map.universityCode}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.provinceName}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.cityName}, #{map.countyId}, #{map.countyName}, #{map.subject}, #{map.majoredId}, #{map.majoredName}, #{map.majoredCode}, #{map.enrollNumber}, #{map.schoolLength}, #{map.foreignLanguage}, #{map.feeStandard}, #{map.enrollInfo}, #{map.creatDate}, #{map.year} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_enroll_plan
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND sort like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sort} , '%')
AND batchId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batchId} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch} , '%')
AND universityCode like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityCode} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND provinceName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceName} , '%')
AND cityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityId} , '%')
AND cityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityName} , '%')
AND countyId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyId} , '%')
AND countyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyName} , '%')
AND subject like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subject} , '%')
AND majoredId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredId} , '%')
AND majoredName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredName} , '%')
AND majoredCode like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredCode} , '%')
AND enrollNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.enrollNumber} , '%')
AND schoolLength like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolLength} , '%')
AND foreignLanguage like CONCAT('%', #{condition.foreignLanguage} , '%')
AND feeStandard like CONCAT('%', #{condition.feeStandard} , '%')
AND enrollInfo like CONCAT('%', #{condition.enrollInfo} , '%')
AND creatDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creatDate} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
